title: Design for Silver Cigarette Box in Open and Closed Views
medium: Brush and black ink on cream paper board
description: Shallow cigarette box shown in small opened view at top and larger closed view below.  Top of box, engraved crest motif with initials "SC" in center; sides scored horizontally with parallel lines.  Top open view reveals four compartments of various shapes and the same crest on underside of lid as on top of lid.
name: Drawing
